## Evidencia
- [ ] CI en verde (GitHub Actions)
- [ ] Backend ejecutado localmente:
  - [ ] composer install
  - [ ] composer lint
  - [ ] composer static
  - [ ] php artisan test
- [ ] Frontend ejecutado localmente:
  - [ ] npm ci
  - [ ] npm run lint
  - [ ] npm run test
  - [ ] npm run build
